channel.title: New Age BD News
channel.description: Latest news articles from New Age Bangladesh

item.title: Sajid laid to rest
item.description: Two-year-old Sajid, who died after falling into an abandoned deep tubewell in Tanore upazila of Rajshahi, was buried on Friday morning....

item.title: Machado says will return to end Venezuela ‘tyranny’
item.description: Nobel Peace Prize winner Maria Corina Machado said in a surprise appearance Thursday that she would do her ‘best’ to return to Venezuela to end the ‘tyranny’ in the country....

item.title: Man held over murder of freedom fighter, wife in Rangpur
item.description: The police have arrested a man in connection with the killing of a freedom fighter and his wife at their home in Taraganj upazila of Rangpur district....

item.title: Fakhrul urges govt for swift action against attackers of Osman Hadi
item.description: Bangladesh Nationalist Party secretary general Mirza Fakhrul Islam Alamgir on Friday urged the interim government and the authorities concerned to take firm action over the shooting of Inqilab Mancha spokesperson and Dhaka-8 potential independent candidate Sharif Osman Hadi, who was critically injured after armed assailants opened fire on him in the capital....

item.title: Yunus instructs to bring attackers of Osman Hadi to justice
item.description: The Bangladesh interim government chief adviser, Professor Muhammad Yunus, has expressed deep concern over the shooting and serious injury of Sharif Osman Hadi - spokesperson of Inqilab Manch and probable independent candidate for Dhaka-8 constituency - by unidentified assailants in the capital’s Bijoynagar area, asking the authorities concerned to bring the perpetrators under the law soon....

item.title: Inqilab Mancha leader Osman Hadi shot in face at Bijoynagar
item.description: Sharif Osman Hadi, the spokesperson of Inqilab Mancha, has been shot on face by unidentified assailants in the capital’s Bijoynagar area on Friday afternoon....News subscription service

item.title: Hamas proposes weapons ‘freeze’ in return for long-term truce
item.description: A top Hamas leader told Qatari news channel Al Jazeera on Wednesday that the militant group is open to a weapons ‘freeze’, but rejects the demand for disarmament put forward in the US-sponsored peace plan for Gaza. ‘The idea of total disarmament is unacceptable to the resistance (Hamas). What is being proposed is a freeze, or storage (of weapons) to provide guarantees against any military escalation from Gaza with the Israeli occupation,’ said Khaled Mishaal in an interview aired Wednesday......
